subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Manchester City and the Yankees teamed up to buy the New York City Football Club, a new Major League Soccer team that is expected to begin competing in 2015, but it has no home to move into.
snippet: Manchester City and the Yankees teamed up to buy the New York City Football Club, a new Major League Soccer team that is expected to begin competing in 2015, but it has no home to move into.
